1588670.name: Hammer & Potion
1588670.description:
Blacksmith or alchemist? Who would you like to be?

Life in the Hammerforge village was peaceful before the dark times. With the rise of King Dracus the dark creatures came. Now, we spend our days trying to save ourselves. We need a hero who will take a stand. Will you be the one? Which path will you choose?

Key Features:


  • Unique fights - the Hamerforge was known for its great blacksmiths and alchemists, and you've been taught to become one of them. Now you have to use THESE skills and wits to defeat the dark creatures.
  • Advanced crafting system - explore the world in search of ingredients and learn how to turn them into a real masterpiece.
  • The story with a twist - discover hidden secrets, unravel the mystery and decide decide how the story will end.
  • Unforgettable challenges - before you meet the dark king, you must face his entourage. These platformer-style fights require preparation and knowledge, and you need to be ready for anything when they begin.
  • A dynamic open world - the dark times have come and the world changes every day. If you find out how and why, you'll be able to fix everything.
